description:
Comfortable feet want to go that extra kilometer. These medium to high support insoles provide a stable platform and shock absorption to reduce foot and ankle fatigue.

  • Wicking material with odour control keeps shoes fresh
  • AeroLyte™ Dual Comfort foam layer puts additional cushioning between you and the ground
  • Responsive forefoot zone puts some spring in your step
  • Cushioned heel reduces trail impacts
  • Deep heel and high arch profile provide medium to high arch support
name: Superfeet Hike Cushion Insoles - Unisex
